Text: Has 2 watermarks that periodically pop up throughout the whole movie, making it virtually unwatchable for me. Who the fuck wants to see that shit when they're watching a movie? I realise it's free and all, but is it so hard to just keep it a nice, clean file? Without you pricks adding your goddamn watermarks onto it. Fuck you "elitepirates" and fuck your website!
I agree I don't want my friends to see some pirate group all over the videos we watch. I want to see the movie.
